/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their facades painted in shades of beige and gray, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are seen in motion on the road, hinting at the city's dynamic pace of life. On the right side of the street, trees and bushes provide a splash of greenery, contrasting with the concrete structures. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
